title: Software QA
job_overview:
Responsibilities
- Develop, maintain, and execute manual and automated test cases across web and API layers
- Collaborate with developers, product managers, and designers to clarify requirements and acceptance criteria
- Write clear bug reports and help prioritize fixes based on risk and impact
- Own regression testing during release cycles
- Set up and improve CI/CD test pipelines
- Contribute to overall QA process improvements and documentation

Requirements
- 2+ years of experience in software quality assurance
- Strong understanding of QA methodologies, tools, and processes
- Experience with test automation frameworks (e.g., Selenium, Playwright, Cypress, or equivalent)
- Familiarity with REST APIs and tools like Postman
- Comfortable with Git, CI systems (e.g., GitHub Actions, CircleCI), and agile workflows
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills

Bonus Points
- Experience testing in a Django or React environment
- Familiarity with performance/load testing tools
- ISTQB or other relevant QA certifications
